title: Static friction - time for coin to slip

content.question: At what time does the coin start slipping relative to the surface?

choices.label: <math alttext="mu sub s, end sub, times b g" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>s</mi></msub><mi>b</mi><mi>g</mi></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator b g, and denominator mu sub s" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>b</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>s</mi></msub></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub s, end sub, times g, and denominator b" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>s</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator g, and denominator b times mu sub s, end fraction" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>g</mi><mrow><mi>b</mi><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>s</mi></msub></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator mu sub s, end sub, times g, and denominator b" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>s</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mrow><mi>b</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
